item.title: Understanding South-East Asian Civilizations - YouTube
item.description: Understanding South-East Asian Civilizations - YouTube Thailand Has high level of fulfilling social roles Felt safe to use public transport [[Rice Farming Culture]] See [[Outliers]] One of the most difficult endeavors People will voluntarily go for sweat shops because it beats Rice Farming Collectivist Different view of the Tend to curb ambition References (References:: Understanding South-East Asian Civilizations - YouTube)

item.title: Saving Face
item.description: Saving Face Morality is driven off representing your nation and status well, in contrast to more classical Western ideas that are more [[Deontology|Deontological]] and focus on your inner goodness/relationship with God.
